Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

XMIDI Timbre Protect (113)

Discussion

< 64: Timbre currently assigned to this channel's patch may be "discarded" (if least-recently-used) to make room in local timbre cache or synthesizer memory

>= 64: Timbre may not be discarded from cache or synthesizer memory

For information on timbre protection, refer to the descriptions of the AIL_protect_timbre / AIL_unprotect_timbre functions.

Next Topic (XMIDI Patch Bank Select (114))

Previous Topic (XMIDI Voice Protect (112))


Group: Extended MIDI Technical Reference
Related Functions: AIL_protect_timbre, AIL_unprotect_timbre
